products.title: Dune Ocean - Roller Blind
products.description: The thing we love about dune ocean is that it offers your home a relaxing and moody blue that will live long in the memory. When you pair it with the gentle backdrop and relaxed minimalist style you get a sense of just what you can do with it. Now that you've heard their interpretation of ocean it's up to you to turn it into something you're proud to have in your home. Take your time with it and remind that great decor is something that comes to those who wait.

products.title: Dune Aztec Stone - Roller Blind
products.description: Dune aztec stone is a fabric that we're proud to call their own, and it's easy to see why when you take a closer look at it. The minimalist design works in perfect harmony with the neutral base colour and relaxing shades of brown. Just what you need to soften the ambience in any room. If you want to create a look that instantly makes you feel at home then the bedroom is the ideal place for aztec stone.

products.title: Kindling Fireworks - Roller Blind
products.description: Kindling in fireworks allows you to add a real crescendo of colour and style to proceedings in seconds. The deep blue is elegant and poised, and the rich copper colour of the patterning stands proud in the foreground. This is a fabric that wants to be noticed, and gets noticed in style. If you are short on ideas for the upstairs landing, why not add fireworks to the mix to create a new focal point? It has the charm and energy needed to catch the eye when you're moving through one of the hardest to decorate spaces in the house.

products.title: Delicia Pickle - Roller Blind
products.description: Bright and eye-catching, the delicia pickle combines apple green with a soft dove grey on a creamy backdrop that lets the natural light filter through, perfect for updating an older home or adding to the contemporary style of a new build. Complement a green or grey dcor scheme in the master or guest bedroom, and accent with matching ornaments and soft furnishings, or simply use to add a pop of colour in a neutral downstairs cloakroom, bathroom, or utility room.

products.title: Dune Tumeric - Roller Blind
products.description: Dune tumeric takes its name from a spice that is something of an enigma. The flavour is to die for and yet it's the colour that's the most striking thing about it. As you look at this latest offering from the dune range you can feel the autumnal glow of the fabric radiating right back at you. Match with other shades of woody brown for a portfolio of natural colour that instantly puts you at ease.

products.title: Capella Rose Gold - Roller Blind
products.description: Capella in rose gold combines understated minimalism with luxurious finishing to create a homage to floral fabric that will live long in the memory. The way in which the rose gold threads dance with the light is sure to stay with you and inspire you for years to come. Add in some other precious metallic finishes in moderation and you'll be able to continue your luxury theme. The secret is to only deploy them as elegant patterns and prints.

products.title: Delicia Powder Pink - Roller Blind
products.description: Delicia powder pink allows you to lose yourself in the moment the instant you see it thanks to the faded look of the fabric. This gives it a timeless quality that invites you to sit back and reflect, and to take in the gentle lines as they trace their way across the canvas. Look closer and you come to see how the free-flowing beauty has been achieved through a lack of a constraining black outline.

products.title: Kindling Ruby - Roller Blind
products.description: Take a look at the beauty of kindling ruby and what do you see first? Is it the vivid colour of the red? Or the exquisite luxury of the gold? It really doesn't matter because you get to enjoy them both for years to come, dancing with the light as they adorn your new look window space. Gold threads and matching deep blues are just what you need to weave ruby into your existing tapestry. It's what allows you to make a statement that this is a luxury home, but without going over the top and overwhelming the senses.

products.title: Capella Silver Blush - Roller Blind
products.description: We love the contrast between the delicate silver thread of silver blush and the soft pink foundation fabric. It has that cute and cosy feel that all decor should, and yet it's the luxurious choice of pattern that really shines through and catches the eye. When you have your heart set on putting your own stamp on things it can be frustrating looking for your perfect match. We created silver blush for those of you looking to blend homeliness, luxury, and a little hint of country style.

products.title: Kindling Peacock - Roller Blind
products.description: Kindling in peacock is a fabric we fell in love with the moment we saw it, and we know you will too. It's the perfect marriage of a regal blue and a luxurious gold. The two colours take on a life of their own as they define a design that is sure to live long in the memory. The beauty of peacock is that it opens the door for royal reds and greens. These are the primary colours of sophisticated luxury, so why not embrace them at every turn? Throw in a little gold and silver for that ideal finishing touch.

products.title: Dune Quince - Roller Blind
products.description: As you take a look at the vibrant green that calls dune quince home you'll find all sorts of decor ideas instantly come to mind. That's the impact it has on your creative way of thinking because of the way in which it radiates charm and charisma around the room. Take the opportunity to introduce matching electric blues to your space by adorning some of your accessories with touches of this ideal secondary colour.

products.title: Delicia Madison - Roller Blind
products.description: The delicia madison unites rich burgundy florals with barely-there grey leaves, sitting on top of a creamy coloured light-filtering fabric, making it an ideal choice for a modern home where light and space are important. Using the madison in the master bedroom will give a feel of elegance and sophistication, with a contemporary twist and grown-up colour tones. Tame dark burgundy walls or provide cream walls with a quick hint of colour, and don't forget to accent with matching accessories.

products.title: Dune Crimson - Roller Blind
products.description: Now, we don't like to use hyperbole all that often, but it's safe to say that dune crimson is one of the most striking combinations of colour and form we've seen in a long while. The minimalism provides the perfect canvas on which the depth of the red can explode into life. Matching the red with a dark navy blue is a great way to celebrate natural colour contrasts without running the risk of overdoing things.

products.title: Anthology Denim - Roller Blind
products.description: If there's an iconic colour and texture that you need in your home then it has to be denim. We thought so for years, which is why we jumped at the chance to add anthology denim to their portfolio of roller blind fabrics. It's a creative mix of blue and white that enables you to go whichever way you want with your decor. The conservatory could be a great option because it combines light and a gentle breeze in a way no other room in the house does.

products.title: Anthology Tuscan Earth - Roller Blind
products.description: Tuscan earth is a hearty and wholesome brown that's been faded in with a crisp white to produce a timeless quality that it's hard to quantify. That's the beauty of great decor because you know it when you see it, and yet it can be so hard to do in the first place. When you want to explore options for the bedroom makeover, why not look into shabby chic? It works wonders when set against the faded brown of tuscan earth, and offers plenty of scope for repurposing furniture.

products.title: Anthology Cobra - Roller Blind
products.description: The rich, slate grey of the anthology cobra is one of depth and warmth, and can create a moody or a natural feel depending on the rest of a room's dcor. Its high quality, grainy finish makes it a delight to use and this sturdy fabric is sure to last year after year. Use in the home office alongside medium woods and white walls for a clean, no-nonsense look, or team with paler greys and beiges in the living room or bedroom for a contemporary but atmospheric feel.

products.title: Anthology Abyss - Roller Blind
products.description: The neutral grey of the anthology abyss is a great colour match for most shades, being a subtle, natural tone. This hushed tone will bring the outside in, and its dim-out properties make it a practical choice, not just a stylish one. For an outdoorsy look in a kitchen or utility, match the abyss with hessian fabrics, wicker furniture, and worn woods, with some wildflowers to complete the look. Or instead, add to a cream home office for a comfortable, clean look and the ideal room to get down to work.

products.title: Anthology Macaroon Cream - Roller Blind
products.description: Anthology macaroon cream combines an intricate countryside weave with a rich and homely creamy shade that instantly makes you feel at home. It's a subtle infusion of warmth and refinement that is just perfect when you want to add a gentle finish to any room in the house. Think about how you want to create a guest bedroom that will instantly make your visitors feel at home. A few country landscapes on the wall, warm white bulbs in the bedside lamps, and of course a few throws over the end of the bed.

products.title: Apollo Aspire - Roller Blind
products.description: The light grey of the apollo aspire adds a versatile neutrality to any window it's used in. Its high quality fabric makes it durable and hardwearing, whilst still being light enough to allow the daylight to gently filter through. The aspire works brilliantly with its sister slates and charcoals, yet also works well at taming bolder reds, blues, and oranges. Use in the living room to complement strong patterns or bright colours, whilst adding a natural feel to the room.

products.title: Anthology Sand Dune - Roller Blind
products.description: Inspirational quality is the only way to describe sand dune, and if you think we're exaggerating then just look at the intricacy of the weave. It's the foundation on which the rest of the design is built, and offers plenty of room for the subtle flecks of white to express themselves. Matching sand dune with other textured finishes like fine wooden grains and cracked leather is a great way to build a theme that's about more than just pure colour.

products.title: Faux Silk Natural - Roman Blind
products.description: In the palest of apricot golds, the faux silk in natural sits on a pretty and delicate fabric, scattered with lines of raised stitching to add texture and depth. The slight and dainty cloth works easily into the sumptuous roman curves, outlaying soft and cloud-like feel. Convert a plain bedroom into a utopia of dreamy elegance by alloying the natural to a scheme of golds and pinks. Choose pale pink walls, in either a plain paint or a floral wallpaper, and accent throughout the room with shimmering pale gold accessories, choosing cream or light wood furniture.

products.title: Origin Deluxe Champagne - Venetian Blind
products.description: Champagne is one of the latest additions to their ever-popular origin deluxe range, and one that is sure to transform the way you think about combining style and substance in your home. The finely crafted slats work in perfect harmony with the gentle fizzle of the colouring and the assortment of accompanying fixtures to create a unique visual that is truly something to savour. Origin deluxe, champagne - venetian blind champagne is one of the latest additions to their ever-popular origin deluxe range, and one that is sure to transform the way you think about combining style and substance in your home.

products.title: Bari Spc Rhino - Roller Blind
products.description: The bari spc in rhino features a distinct material with a plentiful and compelling texture, due to the high quality stitching. This substantial fabric forms a contemporary window display with a simple rolling mechanism, and in modern, denim blue shade. Form a cool and contemporary scheme by incorporating the rhino with stark white, dove grey, and matching navy blue components. Layering the subtly textured blind with contrasting cottons in these subdued hues will help to produce a plentiful decor with harmonising shades.

products.title: Bari Spc Mischka - Roller Blind
products.description: Form a contemporary haven with the bari spc in mischka, with its compelling texture and modern dove grey shade. The exceptional fashioning used to form this dense, distinctive blind creates an alluring feel and its dainty stitching makes for a modern-look window display full of personality. Blend the mischka with a chic collection of whites, charcoals, and subdued greys to generate a modern colour scheme with a subtle monochrome influence.

products.title: Bari Spc Merino - Roller Blind
products.description: Perfect for creating a sophisticated look, the exquisite bari spc in merino features an elegant shade of cream on a resilient cloth adorned with textured stitching. This graceful blind also offers a valuable solar protective coating which helps to keep the room at a comfortable temperature, whatever the time of year. Present the merino in your master bedroom with a soothing palette of creamy tones and compelling golden hues.

products.title: Bari Spc Coconut - Roller Blind
products.description: Perfect for generating a sophisticated and tasteful dcor scheme, the bari spc in coconut features a sumptuous cream shade and luxurious detail. The fine stitching and threads create a subtle and modest texture with a luxury effect and tons of compelling style. Showcase the coconut in your lounge or dining room to form a classy and refined effect with plush fabrics and humble colour. Blend this exquisite cream tone with lavish fabrics and soft furnishings in similar neutral tones, adding golden embroidery and gilded features to finish the look with a touch of luxe.

products.title: Bari Spc Manatee - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the bari spc in manatee within your home for a substantial blind that is both attractive and functional. The innovative solar protective coating contained in this popular range helps to maintain a comfortable temperature within the room by reflecting the sun's heat. And all with a contemporary, cool grey finish to accommodate any surrounding. For a teenager's bedroom, complement the manatee with a white and cobalt surrounding, forming a modern-day palette with a distinct style.

products.title: Bari Spc Governor Bay - Roller Blind
products.description: For a colourful and creative blind, choose the bari spc in governor bay, showcasing a punchy cobalt shade and individualistic detailing. The dainty stitching and illusive threads help to create a modest yet eye-catching pattern with compelling texture and modern style. Use the contemporary governor bay within a teenager's bedroom for a distinctive feature full of captivating colour. Create a modern scheme with a milder background of white and dusky grey, including cobalt and slate grey fabrics and furnishings to form a continual dcor arrangement with bolder features.

products.title: Bari Spc Cararra - Roller Blind
products.description: For a sophisticated look with practical benefits, opt for the popular bari spc in cararra. This exquisite cloth features a unique solar protective coating which helps to keep the room cool by reflecting the sun's heat. The dainty stitching creates a captivating texture, providing an elegant window display perfect for any room in the home. Feature the cararra in your master bedroom, layering with plush golden hues and honeyed fabrics to create an enthralling dcor scheme with warm and welcoming tones.

products.title: Bari Spc Tuscany - Roller Blind
products.description: The bari spc collection is an attractive as well as practical range of quality blinds, with an invaluable solar protective coating. Feature the tuscany edition within any room to produce an elegant window display that also helps to maintain a cool and comfortable temperature throughout the summer months. Present the tuscany in your master bedroom for a sophisticated dcor scheme with punchy colour and compelling texturing.

products.title: Bari Spc Sienna - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the charming bari spc in sienna within your home, offering a unique solar protective coating that helps to keep a constant, comfortable temperature. By reflecting the sun before it enters the room, this beneficial property is ideal for a south-facing room, whilst also providing a sophisticated window display. Transform your master bedroom into a peaceful and classy haven by incorporating the sienna with a complementing palette of taupe, caramel, and chocolate.

products.title: Bari Spc Astra - Roller Blind
products.description: Ideal for a south-facing room, the revolutionary bari spc in astra contains a valuable solar protective coating, which reflects the sun and helps to maintain a constant, comfortable temperature. This exquisite cream shade is sure to add a compelling effect, with its modest sense of style and distinctive texturing. Transform your lounge into a serene haven by including the astra with an array of neutral and modest tones.

products.title: Bari Spc Perano - Roller Blind
products.description: Feature the contemporary bari spc in perano within your home for a burst of soothing cornflower blue with a refreshing quality and modern style. The contrast of the blind's substantial texture and subtle shade creates a distinctive look that offers chic style and, due to its simple rolling mechanism, functional practicality. Breathe life and light into a modern, all-white kitchen by including the perano.

products.title: Origin Deluxe Solitaire - Venetian Blind
products.description: The origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual. By combining bespoke craft with a natural tone, every slat brings an air of relaxation that will instantly make you and your guests feel at home. Origin deluxe, solitaire - venetian blind the origin deluxe range has been expanded to included solitaire: a natural and gentle blend of white and light grey that flows into your home to create a unique homely visual.

products.title: Origin Deluxe African Blackwood - Venetian Blind
products.description: The ultimate in luxury, the origin deluxe african blackwood offers all of the style and functionality of the standard range, yet with a cool, designer look, with its thick louvres and sleek, jet black finish. And, as well as a matching pelmet and rail, it comes with coordinated, high quality ladder tapes. There is no colour combination more glamorous than that of black and gold, so embrace the luxe and pair the two tones together in a contemporary dining room.

products.title: Trippy Nimbus - Roller Blind
products.description: The trippy nimbus is at the height of fashion right now, with its soft grey and funky chevron patterning, and offers a contemporary, up-to-date style that simply can't be matched. Use it for privacy without compromising on light, as this blind will filter it gently through. Use in a modern open living area, set against white walls and grey soft furnishings, with the occasional lime or orange accessory to add a pop of colour.

products.title: Innocence Mint - Roller Blind
products.description: The gentle fern patterning on the innocence in mint is eye-catching without being overpowering, and the soft, mint green backdrop is a beautifully subtle haze of colour that looks particularly pretty as the light filters through it. We all want to wake up to a bright, fresh room to start their morning, and the mint is perfect for helping to achieve that in the master bedroom. Alternatively, combine with whites and soft greys for a gentle, hushed look in the kitchen or dining room.

products.title: Innocence Wedgewood - Roller Blind
products.description: The innocence in wedgewood is a soft, sky blue fabric blind with off-white ferns scattered on top and a cool but homely feel. Light will gently filter through the fabric, giving a soft, mild glow to the room, and the simple rolling mechanism makes it durable and easy to use. Pair with off-white walls for a summery feel in the bedroom all year round, or use as a stand-alone window feature in a hallway or utility room.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe Wengi - Venetian Blind
products.description: Transfix your guests with the distinguishing and dynamic kolsva deluxe in wengi, where bold sophistication meets classic, craftsman excellence. This dramatic, twilight shaded blind with coordinating supports and decorative trimmings, generates a demanding window arrangement with modern components and valuable utility. Fashion a creative master bedroom with striking characteristics and vivid colour by suspending the wengi against a vibrant teal background.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe Sheesham - Venetian Blind
products.description: For a homely and convivial dcor scheme containing authentic, basswood timber and extra designer detail, elect the kolsva deluxe sheesham for its wholesome, conker shade. Sourced from sustainable forests, these craftsman-built, quality louvres, with matching supports and decorative ladders, produce a glamorous window dressing that is both conservational and convenient. Generate a luxury living space by corresponding the sheesham with similarly toned, deep furnishings, and walnut-hued flooring.

products.title: Zaragoza Enoki Marina - Roller Blind
products.description: Enoki marina combines a deep and inspirational blue with a vibrant pattern that's hard to define. The way it ebbs and flows across the fabric is perfect for when you want to express yourself, and yet it still retains that elegant touch of luxury modern decor is known for. If you like the way in which the blue shimmers in the light, why not add a similar crisp green to the mix to provide an elegant colour contrast? The two shades will then come together to create a light and positive space that you'll love to spend time in.

products.title: Ferns Inkwell - Roller Blind
products.description: A deep and moody blue is the inspiration behind this light and breezy fabric. The subtle shimmer and intricate stitching give the ferns a life of their own that makes you feel like a calming breeze is circulating in the room. Perfect for resting and relaxing as you put your feet up. Take a look at dark grassy greens if you want to create a natural colour combination that will live long in the memory.

products.title: Cotswold Deluxe Monroe Bisque - Venetian Blind
products.description: When you want to rest and relax you need a blind that sits gently in the background and doesn't fight for your attention. The gentle colour of cotswold monroe bisque is perfect if you want to create a warm and welcoming atmosphere that flows naturally from your window space. Pairing monroe bisque with a matching rug in front of the fire and some contemporary canvas wall art is the perfect way to make your house a home.

products.title: Crosshatch Silver - Roller Blind
products.description: Crosshatch silver combines a classic geometric pattern with a striking silver that is sure to make a little noise. It's a pattern that seems to reverse depending on the angle of the light, and one which is finished with aplomb by the slightly blueish quality of the silver threads. Combining silver with a dark charcoal is a great way to emphasise the elegance of the shimmer. It's all about giving the threads the platform they need to speak for themselves, so don't be shy about organising your room with this purpose in mind.

products.title: Kolsva Deluxe Sycamore - Venetian Blind
products.description: Uniting practicality with elegance, the kolsva deluxe sycamore hosts modern, adjustable louvres with quality, and coordinating, decorative ladders. This authentic window dressing displays a natural, sun-kissed timber with comparable supports for traditional and tasteful style. Fashion a sophisticated and restful dcor in the boudoir, by embracing the sycamore with similarly toned furnishings and lushly textured wallpaper.

products.title: Ferns Sand - Roller Blind
products.description: Ferns in sand is the dreamy and relaxing fabric you have been searching for, and it's now available as a classic roller blind. The causal way in which the ferns twist and turn on the fabric, catching the light in different ways as they go is testament to the refined subtlety of the design. Transforming the guest bedroom used to be the job that would never end, but those days are now a thing of the past.

products.title: Zaragoza Enoki Oyster - Roller Blind
products.description: Zaragoza enoki oyster takes the traditional silver fabrics you will have seen for years and brings them right up to date in one fell swoop. The way in which it dances with the light serves to accentuate the vitality and energy of the patterning, and adds depth to your decor like never before. Inspiration can be found in the strangest of places, but that doesn't mean you should avoid the obvious sources.

products.title: Ferns Forest - Roller Blind
products.description: Ferns forest captures your imagination the moment you see it thanks to the tranquil green that works in harmony with the gentle shimmer of the threads. Each fern has a lifelike quality of its own that makes you feel as if a gentle breeze is moving subtly in the background. A deep aqua blue or a sandy brown would be perfect bedfellows for the forest green your new roller blinds bring to the table.

products.title: Karma Taupe - Roller Blind
products.description: If you are looking for a dark and moody colour that still adds some light and sparkle to your home, karma taupe could be just what you need. The background glistens and shimmers, making any space feel alive and energetic. And at the same time the matt finish of the trees give it a slightly sombre and tempered feel. A truly thought-provoking contrast. Take your time with taupe, and look to add matching patterns to your wallpaper and scatter cushions.

products.title: Ferns Snow - Roller Blind
products.description: As you stand back and contemplate whether to introduce ferns snow into your home take a minute to think about what you're seeing. The lightweight fabric works perfectly with the crisp white to make you feel at ease the moment you walk in the door. Plus you have the natural inspiration of the plant pattern underneath. It's simple decor at its finest. Take your room in an exciting creative direction by doing away with everything other than natural finishes and looks.
